domain.title: Domain
domain.description: The name of the domain (gmail.com, hotmail.com, yahoo.com).

emails_sent.title: Total Sent
emails_sent.description: The number of emails sent to that specific domain.

bounces.title: Bounces
bounces.description: The number of bounces at a domain.

opens.title: Opens
opens.description: The number of opens for a domain.

clicks.title: Clicks
clicks.description: The number of clicks for a domain.

unsubs.title: Unsubscribes
unsubs.description: The total number of unsubscribes for a domain.

delivered.title: Successful Deliveries
delivered.description: The number of successful deliveries for a domain.

emails_pct.title: Email Percent
emails_pct.description: The percentage of total emails that went to this domain.

bounces_pct.title: Bounces Percent
bounces_pct.description: The percentage of total bounces from this domain.

opens_pct.title: Opens Percent
opens_pct.description: The percentage of total opens from this domain.

clicks_pct.title: Clicks Percent
clicks_pct.description: The percentage of total clicks from this domain.

unsubs_pct.title: Unsubscribes Percent
unsubs_pct.description: The percentage of total unsubscribes from this domain.

domains.title: Lists
domains.description: The top 5 email domains based on total delivered emails.

total_sent.title: Total Sent
total_sent.description: The total number of emails sent for the campaign.

campaign_id.title: Campaign ID
campaign_id.description: The unique id for the campaign.

total_items.title: Item Count
total_items.description: The total number of items matching the query regardless of pagination.

_links.title: Links
_links.description: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.

items.title: Resource Link
items.description: This object represents a link from the resource where it is found to another resource or action that may be performed.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: As with an HTML 'rel' attribute, this describes the type of link.

href.title: Href
href.description: This property contains a fully-qualified URL that can be called to retrieve the linked resource or perform the linked action.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method that should be used when accessing the URL defined in 'href'.

targetSchema.title: Target Schema
targetSchema.description: For GETs, this is a URL representing the schema that the response should conform to.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: For HTTP methods that can receive bodies (POST and PUT), this is a URL representing the schema that the body should conform to.
